Text:
Fuck Gitmo. Any innocent man who goes to Gitmo quickly becomes jihadist as a result. It is a terrorist breeding ground. 

Of course there are some bad men in there who want to hurt people, but if even one innocent is locked up then fuck it all!

So if something isn't perfect it should be done away with?

Well, guess what? You're far from perfect. What shall we do with you?

@GourmetPrince. 

If only one prisoner on Gitmo is innocent - the camp is a great success. If the innocent become a newborn jihadist motherfucker, then he is well taken care of on. 

Gitmo dont breed islamists. Hate is mothers milk for most islamofacists.

Some of them are dogs and must be treated as dogs with rabies. The algerian army did a great job today, even if some hostages was killed. 
In-Shallah.

Thank you uploader.
Every prisoner in Gitmo should be fed to hogs..then the hogs fed to sharks.
